eventParts.text: Please, try to stay close everybirdy. I don’t want you to get lost.
It’s alright, Alex, I’m sure we can manage on our own.
I know, but… it’s dangerous out here. I wouldn’t want to be alone, and I don’t want you guys to be either.
Don’t worry, if any vultures show up I’ll kick their tailfeathers!
Those vultures don’t stand a chance against us!
No, listen. It’s incredibly dangerous out here. We’re deep in vulture territory and we’re surrounded by enemies. I won’t let any of you get harmed!

eventConsequence.selectionText: We’ll stick together and take care of each other. We’re not gonna get hurt.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Alright, thank you. I’m just worried about all of you. Stay close and we’ll get through this!

Alex gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Oh, you worry too much! We’ve done this for a while now, we can take care of ourselves.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Alright, alright. I’m just trying to make sure you’re all safe… 

Alex gains +2 caution!
